divs: sighting detailson 6\15\2010 i was traveling east on bastenchurry blvd between kramer and rose when i noticed to the northeast a very dim amber light in the sky traveling very fast from the west to the east. i saw this objest for a period of .04 seconds and from the time i spotted it to the time it dissapeared, it went about 30 degrese of my windshield. the object was traveling in a straight line and did not seem to ascend or decend. if i was to guess the size of the object i can only say that if i was to hold a pea at my extended reach and look at it, that would be it's size. i first thought that it might be a falling star but it was not bright. something interesting about the travel of this object is that it was close to the landing pattern of los angeles international airport. i witnessed commercial jets in patten flying from the east to the west yet this object was flying from the west to the east. i have lived in the area all my life and have never seen any aircraft flying against the landing pattern especially when aircraft are active. i was in the military and attached to a f-14 squadron and know this was not a military aircraft. no aircraft can travel at the speed that this object was traveling over a densely populated area.
Summary: Dim lit with amber glow, fast mover over 600mph W-E over LAX approach pattern over Carbon Canyon no assect or decent in flight.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brea
There were no other sightings in Brea on or around June 15th 2010
